newsitem.title: USA: Fleet Financial to sell 18 New York branches.
newsitem.headline: Fleet Financial to sell 18 New York branches.

text.p: Fleet Financial Group Inc said Monday it has definitive agreements for the sale of eighteen bank branch locations in upstate New York.

Twelve branches are being sold to Community Bank System Inc headquartered in Canton. The remaining six branches are being acquired by Glens Falls National Bank and Trust Co, a subsidiary of Arrow Financial Corp.
Both transactions are expected to be completed by mid-summer and are subject to regulatory review. Terms of the agreements were not disclosed.
Branches acquired by Community Bank represent $183 million in deposits and $70 million in loans as of December 31.
Branches acquired by Glens Falls represent $144 million in deposits and $37 million in loans as of December 31.
In upstate New York New York, Fleet operates 259 branches and 215 ATMs.
